Our Expert Instructors

Learn from qualified Islamic scholars and experienced teachers who are experts in their respective fields of Islamic knowledge.

Mufti Abdullah

Senior Islamic Scholar

Mufti Abdullah is a distinguished Islamic scholar with over 20 years of experience in teaching Islamic jurisprudence. He specializes in Hanafi and Maliki schools of thought and has authored several books on Islamic law.
